General.Name: China National Complete Plant Import & Export Corp Ltd
General.Description: China National Complete Plant Import & Export Corporation Limited operates as a general trading company in Asia, Africa, Latin America, and internationally. It engages in export of equipment, foreign contract project, general trade, and overseas investment operations. It also exports Cuban black kidney beans and miscellaneous grains. The company exports equipment and project contracting for various industries, such industry, transportation, infrastructure, etc. The company's general trade business includes machinery, agricultural products, textiles, light industrial products, educational supplies, chemical products, building materials etc. Its overseas investment operations are business activities carried out by the company in the form of lease operations in the Togo Sugar Federation. Its products are sucrose and alcohol. China National Complete Plant Import & Export Corporation Limited was founded in 1959 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
